job_announcements.description: Looking for a Data Analyst with experience in SQL, data visualization, and Excel.

matches.cv_description: Data Analyst with experience in SQL and creating data visualizations using Excel.

job_announcements.description: We need a full-stack web developer with experience in React, Node.js, and MongoDB.

matches.cv_description: Experienced full-stack developer specializing in React, Node.js, and MongoDB for web development.

job_announcements.description: Software Engineer with proficiency in Java, Python, and cloud computing technologies

job_announcements.description: Looking to hire product manager with experience in Agile methodologies, project management and leadership skills.
